TopicTitle: [mod ideas/requests] CoM, gimbal and navball centering + strapon gimbals

Articles.Content:
Heya fellow spaceonauts!

 

Would someone be interested in writing a mod, that can automatically trim gimbals, so the thrust vector goes exactly through the CoM, while furthermore offsetting the navball's zero position to the new offset thrust vector?

 

The second idea would be one rocket-part that is basically just a multipurpose engine gimbal, but without an engine. It would react to the usual steering inputs and gimbal any attached engine that comes without a gimbal.

 

Peace
